v1.19.0.description: fixes click focus states for UHF service
fixes hover color on links in mobile
changes c-menu-item component dependency to reduce fragility and override complexity
changes c-menu component dependency to reduce fragility and override complexity
adds call to action with image in category menu
fixes issue with links not stacking in mobile
fixes issue with focus treatments in uhf menus in desktop
fixes issue with focus treatments in uhf menus in mobile
changes select-menu component dependency to reduce fragility and override complexity, and streamlines selectors to improve performance
update UHF multicolumn shape and update CSS
update UHF multicolumn adding media queries

v1.18.0.description: fixes issue with mobile menu hover state
fixes issue with category menu focus color
fixes IE8 issue with search box too narrow/dark
removes old namespace prefix for standalone file
fixes issue with broken menus in no-js scenario
changes hyperlink component dependency to reduce fragility and override complexity, and streamlines selectors to improve performance

v1.17.0.description: fixes issue with border not showing on auto-suggest
fixes issue with inconsistent styling of language toggle and streamlines menu selector output
optimizes selectors to reduce duplicated properties
fixes issue with focus rectangle disappearing from global menus when using the keyboard to expand the menu

v1.16.0.description: fixes issue with long category menu items covering submenu chevron
fixes issue with submenu positioning when menu appears to the left
fixes issue with blurry microsoft logo
fixes issue with no border on search box at VP3
fixes issue with CTA text color on transparent header
applies context class to UHF bundle/namespace to resolve alert styling and other issues
fixes issue with chevrons wrapping on global menus
made edge promo banner show on windows 10 and non-edge browsers
fixes issue with left right padding at vp3 and lower

v1.15.0.description: fixes issue with extra margin at vp5 and higher
fixes issue with global menu positioning in mobile viewports
fixes issue with JavaScript not working in partner test pages
fixes issues with focus states being clipped

v1.13.0.description: adds language selector to global navigation
adds subtle outline around menus when they are open
updates Microsoft logo to align with global link baseline
adds support for multi-column menus at the category-2 level
changes top spacing to 12px on vp6 or greater, 8px on vp5, and 0px for less than vp4
fixes z-index get map issue and updates comments in z-index config scss
fixes mobile menu items being hidden as menus were pushed below viewport
changes breakpoint for shorter category nav to the start of viewport 4
changes category label size to be 24px semilight in all viewports

v1.12.0.description: changes lower level menu color and background differences between light and dark themes
changes VFI contrast ratio to meet accessibility standards for all anchors and buttons
fixes spacing between menu items to be exactly 48px
adds the f-current class to delineate the active menu item
changes the text size for the category label to remain consistent from vp4-vp6
updates Microsoft logos with new image assets

v1.11.0.description: updates color in transparent header to allow for usage on pages with white backgrounds
removes max width from auto-suggest flyout to allow longer content in smaller viewports
fixes issue where auto-suggest displayed behind category navigation
fixes issue for select-menus where the underline would extend under the down caret and would also persist while the menu was open
removes underline behavior in mobile from global and category main anchors and updates transparent theme colors
updates hero image sizes to match updated design for use with transparent header
updates hover and focus states of global navigation, transparent category navigation, and unbranded category navigation
updates transparency in mobile viewport to match new design
updates mobile viewport nav items to have consistent color behavior
removes skip to main from header shape to resolve dependency issues
updates category label so that the font-size reacts to viewport size
updates spacing above header in higher viewports
updates default, hover, focus, and active color of shopping cart to match the design
fixes vertical and horizontal alignment of select menu chevrons
fixes issue where the category nav label would not align with the Microsoft logo at VP6
updates search component styling in light and dark themes

v1.10.0.description: adds light and dark theme support
adds a 'skip to main content' link in the global menu, only accessible via tabbing, for accessibility standards
adds support for fixed top alert
optimizes CSS selectors for IE9 issue and performance improvements

v1.9.0.description: fixes an issue with C1 links being hidden at mobile

fixes an issue with the mobile menu changing the position of the header and background on scroll - the 'x-fixed' class should be placed on the body element while the mobile menu is open, and removed when closed
slims down category menu at vp3 to have a height of 50px
fixes an issue with transparent header showing with a black background in IE8
fixes an issue with mobile header being fixed to top

v1.8.0.description: fixes an issue with the shopping cart not being vertically aligned in smaller VPs
fixes an issue with aria-label not being needed in the paddles for category level
changes cart from button to anchor
removes underline on hover for global and category parent links
removes menu bottom underline for default menu with category branding (migration header)
changes link color to be lighter on default
fixes search box mobile display overflow error
fixes issue with search not showing when nav element is not present
fixes issue with the after tag getting underlined on hover in Edge and IE browsers
updates imagery used in hero in the universal header examples to the correct ratio
